ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def InitializeRow(entity, row): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Criteria from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Parameter
conta = Entity.GetFirstOrDefault(EntityDefinition.GetByName("FN_CONTAS"), Criteria("A.HANDLE = (SELECT CONTA FROM FN_LANCAMENTOS WHERE HANDLE = :CONTA)",Parameter("CONTA",entity.Fields["LANCAMENTO"].Handle)))
if conta <> None : row.GetCellByName("CUSTOM_CONTA").Text = conta.Fields["ESTRUTURA"] + " - " + conta.Fields["NOME"]
